title: American oligarchs: Money in politics
description: Meet the Press Reports: In 2014, only 3 people donated at least 10 million dollars to House and Senate races. In 2022, that number is up to 18 – a six-fold increase.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
